content: if you ve been wanting to try your hand at filet crochet this cuddly crochet blanket is the perfect choice in bernat forever fleece 5 imagined using classic filet crochet and paired with a whimsical triceratops dinosaur motif this lively layer of warmth is both cozy and stimulating for babies use it to cuddle them at naptime or lay it on the ground for tummy time little ones will adore this imaginative blanket making it the perfect gift for a new mom yarn for model bernat® forever fleece finer™ 9 9 oz/280 g 385 yds/352 m light sky 76005 4 balls video tutorial by edie eckman https //www youtube com/watch v=bynsy6c0teu
